App Name: Sally's Spa: Beauty Salon Game

Brief:

Step into the fabulous world of beauty services with "Sally's Spa: Beauty Salon," the vibrant time-management game that'll have you rushing to pamper clients with luxurious treatments. Get ready to test both your speed and strategy as you lead Sally through various spa adventures to earn big cash tips and unlock beautiful locations worldwide.
